title: Cleveland Takes 2-1 Lead In NBA Finals Over Golden State
teaser: The Cleveland Cavaliers dominated Tuesday's NBA Finals game â€” coming out on top over the Golden State Warriors 96-91. The Cavs lead the series 2-1. Game 4 will be played in Cleveland on Thursday.
